title: The Collector
description: Librarian's Note: this is an alternate cover edition - ISBN 10: 0316290238 (ISBN 13: 9780316290234)Hailed as the first modern psychological thriller. The Collector is the internationally bestselling novel that captured John Fowles into the front rank of contemporary novelist. This tale of obsessive love — the story of a lonely clerk who collects butterflies and of the beautiful young art student who is his ultimate quarry — remains unparalleled in its power to startle and mesmerize.
author: John Fowles
